comprehensive_overview: Bio-db-hts is a Python library that provides an easy-to-use interface for working with HTS (High Throughput Sequencing) data. It allows users to access, manipulate, and analyze biological sequence data obtained from high-throughput sequencing technologies.
core_features: Manipulate and analyze biological sequence data
Support for various types of high-throughput sequencing technologies
Integrates with other bioinformatics tools and libraries
